title: Asylum
overview:
Surreal black comedy about an assortment of odd characters trapped in an
 asylum, in a quiet English countryside. It is run by staff whose sanity
 is decidedly suspect, as proved by their admission of the local 
pizza-delivery boy for trumped-up reasons. As the patients try bizarre 
escapes, we are left wondering whether the whole thing is a massive 
experiment, or just a cruel hoax.
